amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide by $5 million and increases funding for Defense Health Programs by a similar amount in order to address alzheimer's disease research.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide by 5 million and increase Defense Health Program by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Speier amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Speier amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Ms. Speier.
